title.narrative: INACTIVE:PCR4 - YE202 - ACCESS TO BASIC EDUCATION

description.narrative: Inactive, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: PCR4 - YE202 - School aged girls and boys including those deprived have access to basic education by end of 2013 in 13 HB and UNDAF (DaO) States,

mailing-address.narrative: Plot 617/618 Diplomatic Drive Central Business District PMB 2851 Garki Abuja

sector.narrative: Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
